title: I have google pixel 4xl Inrolled with 12 beta Just cleared credentials and than it stuck
content:
When I enter right password it comes back on same lock screen 
So I did wipe with key combo 
Now it's in lock mode 
Same pass & old google  Gmail lock
I know both of them 
If I use my current  password  it comes back to lock screen or one step back 
If I click on use google account  inserted its not working 
Can't flash official firmware  also 
Please  need help asap 
As in India we don't have official  service  for pixel 4xl
